messages.title: SAY NO! to Fracking
messages.content: Stops Labour's local climate change cockup. Labour's mistakes. Fracking = disaster for Carshalton and Wallington.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ross pledges to fight against fracking in Carshalton and Wallington to protect the local environment and prevent potential health risks and pollution.

mentions.candidate: Ross pledges to fight against fracking and Labour's mistakes
mentions.tacticalSituation: Standing in a constituency where Labour's mistakes have put the local environment at risk.

issues.environment: Ross opposes fracking and identifies it as a local climate change issue.
issues.health: Mentions potential health risks associated with fracking.

images.caption: ROSS HEMINGWAY YOUR GREEN PARTY CANDIDATE CARSHALTON AND WALLINGTON

leaflet.additionalNotes: ABOUT THIS PUBLICATION - Text not clearly visible.
